text: Baluna, ‘ke tomaderake asamana o yamina theke jibanopakarana sarabaraha karena athaba srabana o drstisakti kara kartrtbadhina [1], jibitake mrta theke ke bera karena ebam mrtake ke jibita hate ke bera karena ebam saba bisaya ke niyantrana karena?’ Takhana tara abasya'i balabe, ‘allah‌’. Sutaram baluna, ‘tabu'o ki tomara taka'oya abalambana karabe na [2]?’
